subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Dejan Stankovic's early goal was a thing of beauty for Inter Milan, but it went downhill for the team after that as it lost, 5-2, to Schalke in the Champions League.
snippet: Dejan Stankovic's early goal was a thing of beauty for Inter Milan, but it went downhill for the team after that as it lost, 5-2, to Schalke in the Champions League.
